data_table.description: Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CORA02
variable.description: NAME OF CORONER/EXAMINER AVAILABLE? Q2 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA03
variable.description: COHORT OR SURVEILLANCE? Q3 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA04
variable.description: CORONER'S INFO LOCATED? Q4 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA05
variable.description: AUTOPSY PERFORMED? Q5 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06A
variable.description: CORONER REPORTS RECENT myocardial infarction? Q6A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06B
variable.description: CHD-IHD-AHD OTHER THAN myocardial infarction? Q6B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06C
variable.description: HYPERTENSIVE HEART DISEASE? Q6C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06D
variable.description: VALVULAR HEART DISEASE? Q6D [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06E
variable.description: OTHER HEART DISEASE? Q6E [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06F
variable.description: RECENT CEREBRAL HEMORRHAGE? Q6F [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06G
variable.description: RECENT CEREBRAL INFARCTION? Q6G [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06H
variable.description: RECENT CEREBRAL EMBOLUS? Q6H [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06I
variable.description: RECENT SUBARACHNOID HEMORRHAGE? Q6I [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA06J
variable.description: RECENT STROKE, OTHER OR UNSPECIFIED? Q6J [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07A
variable.description: ANY NON-CARDIAC, NON-STROKE FINDINGS. Q7A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07B
variable.description: KIDNEY DISEASE? Q7B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07C
variable.description: CHRONIC RESPIRATORY DISEASE? Q7C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07D
variable.description: PSYCHIATRIC DISEASE OR DEPRESSION? Q7D [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07E
variable.description: ALCOHOL OR DRUG ADDICTION? Q7E [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07F
variable.description: EPILEPSY? Q7F [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07G
variable.description: LIVER DISEASE? Q7G [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA07H
variable.description: OTHER CONTRIBUTORS TO DEATH? Q7H [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA09
variable.description: SYMPTOMS PRIOR TO DEATH. Q9 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10A
variable.description: DYSPNEA WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10B
variable.description: DIZZINESS WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10C
variable.description: PALPITATIONS WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10D
variable.description: FATIGUE OR WEAKNESS WITHIN 3 DAYS. Q10D [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10E
variable.description: HEADACHE WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10E [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10F
variable.description: SWEATING WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10F [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10G
variable.description: PARALYSIS WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10G [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10H
variable.description: LOSS OF SPEECH WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10H [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10I
variable.description: INDIGESTION OR NAUSEA WITHIN 3 DAYS. Q10I [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA10J
variable.description: OTHER SYMPTOMS WITHIN THREE DAYS. Q10J [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA11A
variable.description: ACUTE PAIN OR DISCOMFORT LAST 72 HRS. Q11A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA11B
variable.description: PAIN SPECIFICALLY INVOLVED CHEST. Q11B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA11C
variable.description: PATIENT TOOK NITRATES FOR ACUTE PAIN. Q11C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA11D
variable.description: PAIN HAD NON-CARDIAC ORIGIN. Q11D [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA12
variable.description: PLACE OF DEATH. Q12 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA13A
variable.description: ANYONE WITNESS DEATH? Q13A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA13B
variable.description: HAVE NAME/ADDRESS OF WITNESS? Q13B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA13C
variable.description: RELATIONSHIP OF WITNESS TO DECEDENT. Q13C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA14
variable.description: TIME FROM ONSET OF SX TO DEATH. Q14 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA15A
variable.description: Is there a history of a myocardial infarction prior to the onset of this event? Q15A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA15B
variable.description: Did an MI occur within four weeks prior to this event? Q15B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA15C
variable.description: HOSPITALIZED FOR myocardial infarction IN LAST 4 WEEKS. Q15C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA15D
variable.description: DO YOU KNOW THE NAME OF THE HOSP? Q15D [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA16
variable.description: Is there any history of angina pectoris or coronary insufficiency? Q16 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA17
variable.description: Is there a history of any other chronic ischemic heart disease? Q17 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA18
variable.description: Is there a history of valvular disease or cardiomyopathy?Q18 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA19
variable.description: Is there a history of coronary bypass surgery prior to this event? Q19 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA20
variable.description: Is there a history of coronary angioplasty prior to this event? Q20 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA21A
variable.description: Is there a history of stroke prior to this event? Q21A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA21B
variable.description: STROKE IN LAST FOUR WEEKS. Q21B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA22
variable.description: Is there a history of hypertension (high blood pressure) prior to this event? Q22 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA22A
variable.description: History OF DIABETES. Q22A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA22B
variable.description: History OF SMOKING. Q22B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA23A
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? TAKING NITRATES IN LAST MONTH. Q23A [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA23B
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? TAKING CA CHANNEL BLOCKS LAST MO. Q23B [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA23C
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? TAKING BETA-BLOCKERS IN LAST MO. Q23C [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA23D
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? TAKING DIGITALIS IN LAST MONTH. Q23D [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA23E
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? TAKING ACE INH. IN LAST MONTH? Q23E [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA23F
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? TAKING ASPIRIN IN LAST MONTH? Q23F [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORAFLAG
variable.description: =1 IF CORA (OR OTHER VER) IS PRESENT [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: FORMVER
variable.description: Version letter [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: CORA01_DAYS
variable.description: DATE OF DEATH Q1 - Days from Exam 1 [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID [Coroner / Medical Examiner Form, COR]
